title: Sesame Street's Grover On Coping During Coronavirus: Just For Kids
description: Hey kids! Sesame Street's Grover is here and he's got some great ideas for making your days brighter during coronavirus. Grover explains how to make virtual play dates more fun, how to daydream and how to be a helper.
